/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades blending harmoniously with the blue sky above. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow that contrasts with the cool tones of the buildings and sky.
